website_summaries.verdict: A well-made platform bike rack that's easy to install and operate.
pros: Fits 2 bikes with no bike-to-bike contact
Quick to load and unload bikes
cons: Multiple users have had to re-tighten the rack base before every use

customer_reviews.title: What a rack!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this rack to hold our two new Pedego electric bikes and couldn't be happier. Each bike weighs about fifty pounds with the battery removed and this rack handles the weight without issue. Both bikes are wider than average road bikes but the rack fits them just fine. The rack appears to be constructed with very heavy-duty components and went together easily (especially after reading the directions...). As others have mentioned, the locking system to hold the rack to the hitch is fairly weak so I'll be drilling out the threads and using a hardened steel locking pin instead. Other than that minor hiccup, I high recommended this for any bike but especially heavier and/or electric bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the product, BUT...it's rusting too quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I first bought this. It's stable, sturdy and easy to use. But it's not wearing well. After only 6 months it's showing rust in a few places. I called the company and apparently, rust is not covered, nor did they have any advice other than to unmounted it when not in use. When I objected over the weight of it, they had no reply other than to say it's the elements. Do better please. My car does not rust in 6 months and neither should this! I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: thule bike rack for 1 1/4 hitch
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new car...and what do you know....I had to switch all my attachments to a 1 1/4 inch hitch. So I was very glad to find that thule made a twin bike rack in 1 1/4 inch hitch. Not so happy to pay the price...but oh well....in the end, it's great to be able to take the bikes out again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne T

customer_reviews.title: Hubby LOVE this bike rack
customer_reviews.text: Per hubby who uses it all the time: "It loads and unloads within seconds, folds up beautifully and out of the way, great width, bike is extremely secure. The rack does NOT include the locks to lock the bikes in place- the arm that goes over the tire moves up and down to adjust, but you have to order the lock that keeps the arm from moving separately. My bikes are much more secure in this than any other bike rack that I have had." Easy to order, ships great and easy to put together and install.
customer_reviews.author: BrazingtonBlurb

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Brilliant Engineering, fine product, excellent materials and high quality workmanship. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Thule product I have purchased. Firstly, wow! What a brilliantly engineered bike rack. Easy assembly, perfect assembly instructions, a place for everything and everything in its place. Very rugged and holds the bikes firmly in place. Doesn't wobble around moving down the road. I highly recommend this bike rack. Assembly took about ten minutes and all tools were furnished with the kit except a flat screw driver, perfect. No more playing Tetris to jamb the bikes in the back of the rig with all the camping gear.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike rack for mountain bikes
customer_reviews.text: After buying my truck and using my bed for awhile I got sick of taking the front wheel off of my mountain bike. I then made the decision to order a bike rack such as this. This rack is on the heavier side of the scale. With that said it is extremely durable and stable. Everything seems to be well made and built to last. This is something I will be keeping with me for a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Happy biker.
customer_reviews.text: We chose this rack because it does not contact or put pressure on the brake cables along the lower part of the frame This rack is very sturdy and there is virtually no movement of the bikes when in motion. It takes a little practice to get the bikes aligned properly, but fairly easy to mount the bikes and ensure a secure fit. Overall we are very happy with our purchase. We have had several Thule products in the past that have lasted many years and expect the same from this rack as well.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted, almost
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy the newer version but the price on this was too good and I couldn't justify the extra money. This rack is awesome. I do wish they would include the two locks for the tire clamps, but the rest of it is really well built and I like the design work that went into it. Could it be better, yes, but for the money this is a great rack and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bikes are Happy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this bike rack. It was an upgrade for us, from an adjustable "hatch rack" which only fit certain types of bikes. Now we can transport any kind of bike we need to! (fatty, cruiser, road bike, etc) It's a little cumbersome to get around dealing with situations like loading the groceries, band gear, or home project items into the car (I have a Ford Escape). But hauling bikes is a breeze, and that's what matters!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Finders

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - and does the Job
customer_reviews.text: After some issues with the lever, this is sturdy rack, and carries the bikes safely, and does the job. The Level that releases the rack up and down was a bit difficult to operate, though after applying WD-40, seemed to ease it all up. Thule could have added reflector tape in some areas as it black and difficult to see in the dark. Otherwise decent rack.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great bike rack
customer_reviews.text: Installed this rack on our 2010 Volvo XC-70 for our trip up to NH and it worked perfectly. It is extremely sturdy and solidly built. There was absolutely no noticeable wobble to the two bikes even at highway plus speeds. I highly recommend this bike rack. With the Thule name behind it how can you go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JohnJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid rack,
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, lock for the hitch bolt is a piece of junk but the locks for the tire holders are good and easy to use. Mine came with fat tire trays, glad it did as I can use it with any bike
customer_reviews.author: ron arnott

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, kinda long, could use a reflector or stop light.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bike rack. Got the extension too, now it can haul up to four bikes with ease. It is a bit heavy and best used with a truck or larger vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Gambit3le

customer_reviews.title: NOT for bikes with tire fender on front fork
customer_reviews.text: Great rack. Read great reviews, so ordered it. Nothing in the description mentions that this rack can only be used with bikes with no front tire fender. Once I got it and read the instructions they make it clear that not for bikes with front fender. Mount is intended to clamp down on the front tire within 1" on frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thule T2 Classic
customer_reviews.text: Rack itself is exactly as expected, solid construction, slightly heavy. Front wheel locking system works great rear wheel holder strap should be longer. Its hard to get it tight being so short. For the price should have come with locks for the front wheel arms.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and easy off
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that it was challenging to assemble and I didn’t find that to be true. Now that I do have it on my car, I love the ease of which I can load and unload my bike and go for a ride. I’ve had a trunk rack that was harder to load and unload my bike and would scratch my car paint. This is great.
customer_reviews.author: cancinos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Wow- super easy to assemble inside house and attach to hitch. Loading bikes is a breeze and they are VERY secure when driving.
customer_reviews.author: liza qaddourah

customer_reviews.title: heavy, but robust!
customer_reviews.text: The bike rack is pretty heavy, but it tenaciously hangs onto the bikes that are loaded on to it. Bikes do not move once they are secured.
customer_reviews.author: a drinker with a music problem

customer_reviews.title: why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: This works for hundreds less than others. Does the exact same thing. Save yourself a few bucks and get this.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: So nice to use.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly heavy to move from house to vehicle. The lock won’ t fit on the pin, as the pin is too long and opening not big enough on my CX5. But, love, love, love the ease of putting on the bikes. And they travel beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: New to trail biking
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and very easy to use.like how it folds up out of way when parking.holds bike very secure And is quiet down the street
customer_reviews.author: Dan Horak

customer_reviews.title: Ok rack but could use improvements
customer_reviews.text: It is a heavy and sturdy bike rack, however for some reason every time I use it, I need to retighten the bolt holding the rack base to my car hitch. Even though the bike is held securely, there is still excessive movement. Another thing I was not happy about was the fact that there are three locations for locks, the hitch and then locking your two bikes into the rack, however, the rack only comes with one lock, you need to buy an extra 2 pack for another $40...with the rack being over $400 in the first place, I think all the locks should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: My local bike shop referred me to a local mechanic who was able to dismount it and then refinished the insertion tip with a better coating and now all is well
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to set up and use. Mine had what appears to have been a heavier coating of paint and was VERY difficult to insert and nearly impossible to remove through. My local bike shop referred me to a local mechanic who was able to dismount it and then refinished the insertion tip with a better coating and now all is well.
customer_reviews.author: TheCzar

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to put it together and parts are missing. We have to work through the Thule site for replacement hitch. Not convenient
customer_reviews.author: GBPBFER

customer_reviews.title: I like the rack a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like the rack a lot. Very smooth functioning. However, one major problem... the connection of the rack to my hitch keeps coming loose. I literally have to tighten that bolt connection every time I put my bike on there. Not sure why it keeps coming loose, I used the crush washer, and wrenched the bolt down good.
customer_reviews.author: David Heck

customer_reviews.title: This rack is awesome! Fits my bikes with no problem
customer_reviews.text: This rack is awesome! Fits my bikes with no problem. I have both a 26er and 29er. I ended up buying the lock cylinders for added piece of mind when I leave my bikes unattended, at the grocery store or liquor store when going our coming back from a trip. Just makes me feel at ease. It folds up nicely. However when folded up, it seems to hit my bumper a bit so I decided to grind off some of the plastic so it didn't rub on my car. But it could be that I didn't mount my hitch fully, as far out as possible.
customer_reviews.author: TattedSaint

customer_reviews.title: just send me what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Overall this a great well built bike rack,missing in the box was the 3/8 in safety pin they said to send the whole rack back to amazon.Thule should have sent a new pin which I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Law

customer_reviews.title: Comes assembled
customer_reviews.text: Incredible rack !! Hold my two bikes perfectly ... best part it came complete assembled ...
customer_reviews.author: Dr Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put bikes on and off. the bikes stay on rack with minimal wobling. very solid rack
customer_reviews.author: David Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent carrier. I used it to transport our bikes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent carrier. I used it to transport our bikes from our winter home to summer home a distance of 1200 miles and everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: captaingadget

customer_reviews.title: Works well for securing bikes as well as not scratching ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for securing bikes as well as not scratching bikes. Works well on 29 inch wheels. Not sure it will work with fat tire bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda O. Maher

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty bike rack!
customer_reviews.text: Holds two 60 lb, fat tire electric bikes with ease. Sturdy, quality product. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Bell

customer_reviews.title: Eady install, super convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought one long ago. Come home from riding downhill, pull the bike off put the road bike on. Ready in 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: jeff mills

customer_reviews.title: Great product but locks were missing in package
customer_reviews.text: The 2 bike locks were missing so I need replacement locks so I can lock the bikes to the rack
customer_reviews.author: Jeff DeHaan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, holds my bikes securely, took about 20 to 30 minutes to put together
customer_reviews.author: wayne casey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 'arms' are stiff but i hope they will become more moveable.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: They save 28 cents per bolt and make an inferior product because of it.
customer_reviews.text: The main bolts that hold the racks onto the crossbar are cheap aluminum. Really? So I had to move them slightly from the original setup, and 5 of the 8 bolts stripped when Loosened/Tightened. Thule could have spent an extra 28 cents and put hardened steel bolts, yet opted for cheap. Thule is on the decline. Idiot production manager thinking they will save 28 cents per unit, but instead they now sell an inferior product. They
customer_reviews.author: Tim little

customer_reviews.title: Secure and simple to operate
customer_reviews.text: Rack is solid as is with all Thule products. This is the 2nd Thule bike rack we use daily and it is intended for my wife’s car to transport my child’s bike. Easily fits a 24” and 26” bike and holds securely. This is much easier to use than the hitch mount, hanging style rack and simple to operate. This rack is heavy and bulky and took about 30 minutes to assemble and mount. As others have noted, be gentle when mounting the wheel trays to the rack and don’t overtighten. The rack is heavy and bulky so it could be tough to mount initially and could be two person job.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bike rack - bikes do not touch or get bet up
customer_reviews.author: BOBIJEAN MCFADDEN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very solid rack. Easy to assemble. Should make getting our bikes to Montana a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: robert Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike rack only draw back was no locks for the Thule grips not included for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rack, very quick and easy to load bikes. Assembly is not too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: High quality, stable platform stand (2013 Jeep Grand Cherokee)
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Extremely stable platform rack for a vehicle with a 2" hitch (I have a 2013 Jeep Grand Cherokee Overland with the towing package). No wobble, heavy construction, great design. A little cumbersome to move around (again--heavy with quality metal), but a wonderful rack.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: The product is what I expected. Not too difficult to assemble, however I did have to remove the paint on the Hitch area for it to fit into my receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Custom Pin big Negative
customer_reviews.text: The custom pin required to connect to your vehicle is a REAL negative!!!! It’s a custom pin that I have only seen on this model. The other Thule uses a standard pin
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Installation was little tricky, but in the end could manage it on my own. Will be great if Thule can also provide some online video by themselves how to install after a car hitch has been installed. Else one needs to spend more money to get them installed.
customer_reviews.author: Mayank Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Great bike rack
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike rack. I selected this rack because I was not comfortable with the racks that the bikes hung on arms. This platform rack is very sturdy. I did have a couple of issues with the parts that came with rack as the box appeared to have been previously open and I was missing a tire strap one one of the bike platforms and the other platform strap was damaged. I called Thule up and they sent replacement parts out that day. Otherwise, no other issues with this rack. been using it for over a month now and love how secure the bike are on the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: I like the product and it is installed on the car
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it is installed on the car, I had another bike shop put it together and they said it was missing a couple crucial parts. So I had to go on to thule site and order them and it did cost extra money. so can I get reimburst for the extra parts I had to get? The bike shop says if I do not get these parts the rack will not work.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Not really for Fat Bikes.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really fit fat bikes. Tire straps are too short to go around fat bike tires. The post you ratchet down on the tire is too short for fat bike tires. If you press real hard you can get it down 2 clicks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: That it folds. If removing it from the hitch could be made easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bike rack!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and secure. Holds my bike well and I know its actually held and wont fall off or hit my car and scratch the paint like my trunk mount did. For 2010-2013 Mazda3 owners. If you have a third party tow hitch (not Uhaul). I found that the way it sits is at a slight angle up. Meaning you can't put this rack on and throw it up. You have to turn the tire holder around backwards for it to sit correctly. Then turn it back around to what its suppose to be when mounting a bike. Other than that great bike rack!
customer_reviews.author: Axela

customer_reviews.title: ... parts were assembled improperly and the entire rack is dirty.
customer_reviews.text: One of the tire trays is broken and it does not appear to be new because some parts were assembled improperly and the entire rack is dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but really good
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Assembly took maybe 10 min. Easy to use. Much better than prior products we've used. Locks for each bike mount available separately from the manufacturer, and we bought them. They are keyed the same as the rack
customer_reviews.author: Douglas P. Moard

product_meta.title: Thule T2 Classic Hitch Mount Bike Carrier
product_meta.description: The Thule T2 classic is a super rugged platform carrier with frame free clamping security for all types of bikes. Available models for 1.25" and 2" receivers and a 2 bike add-on for 2" receivers only.
feature_bullets: Secure bikes quickly without frame contact with the frame-free ratcheting arm
Eliminate bike interference by adjusting side to side to create generous spacing between bike mounts
Ideal for carbon frames, mountain, downhill, and fat bikes as it fits 20 - 29” wheels and up to 5” tires without adapters
Convenient access to rear of vehicle when bikes are loaded – rack tilts away from vehicle via HitchSwitch lever
Bike rack locks to vehicle with SnugTite Lock included. Load capacity- 100 Pounds
DO NOT INSTALL on a trailer or other towed vehicle.
DO NOT USE product with bike that has tire fenders. This prevents snug hook grip on tire.
Not intended for tandems or recumbents.
